en: Supermom with 16 children between the ages of 19 and seven months, reveals her lockdown regime ... I have.' Before quarantine Doris and William were already spending at least 15 hours a day caring for their family with military precision to master family meals, schoolwork, endless hospital visits, bath times and family outings. But that routine ended in mid-March when states forced families to isolate. Doris explained: 'They are up at 7am and if you don't  ... over while another one of my children is stuck up a tree but that is all part of the fun. Incredibly Doris manages to spend three hours a night studying when the children have been put to bed. She is trying to earn a Bachelors Degree in psychology from a university. But for now, she is content on living her super-sized daily life Due to health issues with the young children and because Doris  ...

Father's Day gift guide 2020: How to shop online for Dad this year ...  has plenty of choices for the carnivore in your life. If your dad is a little more adventurous, why not try Buffalo Bob's brand meat sticks in unusual flavors like alligator, kangaroo and wild boar? Speaking of carnivores? Does your dad like to grill? If so, maybe he'd like a grilling gift basket from Kohl's or a 17-piece tool kit from Bed Bath & Beyond? Or stay indoors by using an electric, smokeless grill from Wayfair.com. A number of local breweries are offering home delivery. Among the local options are: Great Lakes Brewing Co. , Platform Beer Co. , Masthead Brewing Co. and Saucy Brew Works . You can also find additional local options on Drizly . TECH & GADGET IDEAS Hot or cold, there are plenty of gadgets out there to help you make your own ...
